description: '''Hanna Elise Isabell Maj Höstblomma Ryd''' (born 15 October 1984), known professionally as '''Elize Ryd''' ({{IPA|sv|ɛˈliːs ryːd}}), is a Swedish singer, best known as one of the three vocalists and co-lyricist in the [[Heavy metal music|heavy metal]] band [[Amaranthe]]. She also gained some popularity prior to the band's inception by performing guest vocals for the American [[power metal]] band [[Kamelot]], both on tour and in the studio. She sings in the [[soprano]] range.
